entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle or ice pellets early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
